overview: In the midst of the current recession, a series of disastrous telephone messages triggers a major domestic crisis fro the Kosnicks, a yuppie couple at the end of their rope. In the height of their despair, a door-to-door salesman tries to sell them a book about positive thinking, but for the Kosnicks it may be too late...
tagline: A yuppie pair slides into crisis due to catastrophes which are reported to them via telephone. A salesman appears at their door ...
title: The Debt
